hypotheses.title: Ad Fatigue reducing CTR and conversions
hypotheses.evidence: ROAS declining with consistent spend and impressions; CTR also low for multiple campaigns.

hypotheses.title: Increased competition in ad auctions
hypotheses.evidence: ROAS decline despite steady CTR may suggest higher CPMs or auction pressure.

hypotheses.title: Audience targeting misalignment
hypotheses.evidence: CTR low across multiple demographic segments; possible mismatch with creative messaging.
